Documentation

Before you start developing Antom products and solutions, familiarize yourself with our latest documentation including developer guides, API reference, code samples, and more.

See Legacy documentation for previous versions of Antom documentation, including product docs, APIs, and release notes on Cross-border Payment Services, Face-to-face Payment Services, and others.

Online payment

Supercharge your online business by accepting all e-wallets and alternative payment methods.

  • Checkout Payment
  • EasySafePay
  • Scan to Bind
  • Auto Debit
  • Subscription Payment
In-store payment

Enhance payment experience in your store with a secure and seamless digital payment service.

  • User-Presented Mode Payment
  • Order Code Payment
  • Entry Code Payment
Solutions

Innovative industry-specific solutions to boost business opportunities and growth.

  • Smart Restaurants
  • Retail Stores
  • Tickets

Services

Revenue Booster
Raise your transaction success rate with this all-in-one toolkit.
Combined Payment
Combine multiple orders in a single transaction with this e-commerce solution.
Flexible Settlement
Split payouts: the cost-efficient way to stakeholders in your e-commerce ecosystem.

Resources

Integration guide
RECOMMENDED
A comprehensive guide to end-to-end integration.
Antom Dashboard
An all-in-one console that helps developers throughout the entire integration process.
SDKs
An installable package that contains all the resources needed for integration.
APIs
A set of functions to develop high-availability applications.
Digital signature
A signature algorithm required for API message transmission.
Tools
A set of developer tools built directly into Antom Dashboard to simplify integration.
Test wallet
Alipay-provided test wallet to facilitate your integration.
Dispute
A guide to understand, handle, and prevent disputes.
Merchant service
Tutorials about merchant operations.
Reconciliation
RECOMMENDED
Guides to learn about Alipay settlement rules and perform reconciliation.
